problem.markdown: A numerical input problem accepts a line of text input from the student, and evaluates the input for correctness based on its numerical value. Spiders sometimes have 6 eyes, though most have 8. Pi, or the the ratio between a circle's circumference to its diameter, is an irrational number known to extreme precision. It is value is approximately equal to 3.14. [explanation]
